answers.answer: That doesn't sound that big. Mine was 7.6 at 35 weeks. I'm being induced at 39 weeks because of gestational diabetes.
ueah I know that why I confused I do have high blood pressure and history of preterm labor and birth, but still confused on want she want.

I am also being induced at 39 weeks because my baby is 7 and a half lbs already (at 36 weeks) and already starting to dilate. At least now I know that by May 14th I will have my baby in my arms (if I don't go into labor early) and I was upset when I found out how big my daughter is. But like my doctor said, "it's better to have a bigger healthy baby, then a small baby that isn't getting the nutrients it needs." Hope that helps! :)

question: So my doctor wants me to have my before 39 week but go in to labor, cause sje worried about how big she is at 36 weeks and 1 day, she says I need to start having contractions, grrr I don't know what to do at she say we need to wait and now she says this.
title: Confused about what my OB wants
